title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Bengio obtained his Ph.D. in Computer Science in 1993 with a thesis titled Optimization of a Parametric Learning Rule for Neural Networks from the Université de Montréal. Before that, Bengio got an M.Sc. in Computer Science in 1989 with a thesis on Integration of Traditional and Intelligence ...

title: Samy Bengio
snippet: Samy Bengio (PhD in computer science, University of Montreal, 1993) was a research scientist at Google from 2007 to 2021. Prior to that, he was senior researcher in statistical machine learning at IDIAP Research Institute, where he supervised ...

title: Samy Bengio (Computer Scientist) - On This Day
snippet: During his time at Google, where he served as a research scientist from 2007 to 2021, Bengio worked on various projects related to machine learning and AI, including the development of deep learning techniques for natural language understanding and speech recognition.
